title: Make the calendar widget smaller and refine the app to a stylish, minimalist look

requirements.text: Refine the existing LiveCalendarWidget to be noticeably more compact and minimalist while preserving the current functionality (local device date/time, live updates at least once per second, compact month grid, highlight current day).

quotes: i said small calendar and make app for stylish and minilimatsit like title and all

acceptanceCriteria: The widget still updates the time at least once per second while visible.
The widget footprint is reduced compared to the current implementation (smaller typography, tighter spacing, less vertical padding) without reducing readability.
Current day remains visually distinct from other days.
No new features are added to the calendar (no navigation, event creation, reminders).

requirements.text: Update the Dashboard header area (app title + streak + calendar area) to follow a consistent minimalist, stylish layout: tighter spacing, clearer hierarchy, and a cohesive typographic scale that matches the compact calendar.

quotes: make app for stylish and minilimatsit like title and all

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard header (title/streak/calendar) reads as a single coherent header block with consistent spacing and alignment.
The calendar remains near the top in the header area and does not disrupt existing metrics cards layout.
All user-facing text in the header remains in English.

requirements.text: Apply a minimalist styling pass across the app screens (Dashboard, Study, Gym, Nutrition, Goals, BottomNav) to make typography, spacing, borders, and card density feel consistent with the compact header/calendar, while keeping the existing dark/neon aesthetic.

quotes: make app for stylish and minilimatsit like title and all

acceptanceCriteria: Across pages, headings use a consistent size scale and weight; card padding and gaps feel consistent and slightly tighter than before.
Existing dark/neon theme tokens/utilities (e.g., bg-card-dark, border-border-subtle, neon accents) are preserved; the app remains dark-themed.
Bottom navigation remains fixed and functional with clear active state.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components instead).
Do not modify any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts).
Keep existing calendar behavior: local time, live updating, and current-day highlighting.
nonGoals: Add reminders, events, or calendar interactions (month switching, adding notes).
Backend changes or data persistence related to the calendar widget.
